With Your Friends And Family

Stay connected with your friends, family, or coworkers wherever you are for free and quickly.

services

We provide the best service for you

Fast & Powerful

Talky delivers messages faster than any other application and also has no limits. on the size of your media and chats.

Simple Messaging

Message your friends & family for free. Talky uses Internet connection to send messages so you can avoid SMS fees.

Keep Safety & Privacy

Your messages are heavily encrypted and can self-destruct and Talky keeps your messages safe from hacker.

Group Chats to Stay Connected

Stay connected with the groups of people that matter most, like your friends, family, or coworkers wherever you are. With group chats, you can share messages, photos, and videos with up to 1000 people at once. You can also name your group, mute or customize notifications, and more.

Learn More

Talk Freely with Voice and Video Call

With voice calls, you can talk to your friends and family for free. even if they're in another country. And with video calls, you can have face-to-face conversations for when voice or text just isn't enough. Talky voice and video calls use Internet connection. so you don't have to worry about expensive calling charges.
